main.name: My Portfolio
main.description: I am a 3rd year CSE undergrad @ IIITB. I love to do web development, app development and love to explore fields like Machine Learning and Software Engineering
main.bio: Hello Guys! I am Manas Agrawal, a 3rd year undergrad @ IIITB. I did my high school from Indore, Madhya Pradesh in 2020. After that I joined iMTech program in IIITB and currently doing specialisation in AIML.
